00020 
00021 KShowmailView::KShowmailView( AccountViewModel* accountModel, MailViewModel* mailModel, QItemSelectionModel* mailSelectModel, QItemSelectionModel* accountSelectModel, QWidget* parent ) : QSplitter( Qt::Vertical, parent )
00022 {
00023         
00024         //Split the view into two parts
00025         QSplitter* splitter = new QSplitter( Qt::Vertical, this );
00026 
00027         //create account view
00028         viewAccounts = new QTreeView( splitter );
00029         viewAccounts->setModel( accountModel );
00030   viewAccounts->setIndentation( 0 );
00031   viewAccounts->setContextMenuPolicy( Qt::ActionsContextMenu );
00032         AccountViewDelegate* delegateAccounts = new AccountViewDelegate( this );
00033         viewAccounts->setItemDelegate( delegateAccounts );
00034   viewAccounts->setContextMenuPolicy( Qt::ActionsContextMenu );
00035   viewAccounts->setSelectionModel( accountSelectModel );
00036   viewAccounts->setSortingEnabled( true );
00037   
00038         //create mail view
00039         viewMails = new QTreeView( splitter );
00040         viewMails->setModel( mailModel );
00041   viewMails->setIndentation( 0 );
00042   viewMails->setSelectionMode( QAbstractItemView::ExtendedSelection );
00043   viewMails->setSelectionModel( mailSelectModel );
00044   viewMails->setSortingEnabled( true );
00045   viewMails->setContextMenuPolicy( Qt::ActionsContextMenu );
00046         
00047         //save the pointer to the models
00048         this->mailModel = mailModel;
00049         this->accountModel = accountModel;
00050         
00051         loadSetup();
00052 
00053 }
00054 
00055 KShowmailView::~KShowmailView(){}
00056 
00057 void KShowmailView::refreshViews( QItemSelectionModel* mailSelectModel )
00058 {
00059   AccountViewModel* accountModel = dynamic_cast<AccountViewModel*>( viewAccounts->model() );
00060   accountModel->refresh();
00061 
00062   MailViewModel* mailModel = dynamic_cast<MailViewModel*>( viewMails->model() );
00063   mailModel->refresh();
00064 
00065   //mark filtered mails
00066   QModelIndexList markedMails = mailModel->getMarkedMails();
00067   QListIterator<QModelIndex> itMark( markedMails );
00068   while( itMark.hasNext() )
00069   {
00070     QModelIndex index = itMark.next();
00071     mailSelectModel->select( index, QItemSelectionModel::Select | QItemSelectionModel::Rows );
00072   }
00073 }
00074 
00075 void KShowmailView::saveSetup() {
00076 
00077         //get config objects
00078         KConfigGroup* configAcc = new KConfigGroup( KGlobal::config(), CONFIG_GROUP_ACCOUNT_LIST );
00079         KConfigGroup* configMail = new KConfigGroup( KGlobal::config(), CONFIG_GROUP_MESSAGE_LIST );
00080         
00081         //save the column widths
00082   if( !viewAccounts->isColumnHidden( 0 ) )
00083     configAcc->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_ACTIVE, viewAccounts->columnWidth( 0 ) );
00084 
00085   if( !viewAccounts->isColumnHidden( 1 ) )
00086     configAcc->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_ACCOUNT, viewAccounts->columnWidth( 1 ) );
00087 
00088   if( !viewAccounts->isColumnHidden( 2 ) )
00089     configAcc->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_SERVER, viewAccounts->columnWidth( 2 ) );
00090 
00091   if( !viewAccounts->isColumnHidden( 3 ) )
00092     configAcc->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_USER, viewAccounts->columnWidth( 3 ) );
00093 
00094   if( !viewAccounts->isColumnHidden( 4 ) )
00095     configAcc->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_MESSAGES, viewAccounts->columnWidth( 4 ) );
00096 
00097   if( !viewAccounts->isColumnHidden( 5 ) )
00098     configAcc->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_SIZE, viewAccounts->columnWidth( 5 ) );
00099 
00100   
00101   if( !viewMails->isColumnHidden( 0 ) )
00102     configMail->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_STATE, viewMails->columnWidth( 0 ) );
00103   
00104   if( !viewMails->isColumnHidden( 1 ) )
00105         configMail->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_NUMBER, viewMails->columnWidth( 1 ) );
00106 
00107   if( !viewMails->isColumnHidden( 2 ) )
00108     configMail->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_ACCOUNT, viewMails->columnWidth( 2 ) );
00109 
00110   if( !viewMails->isColumnHidden( 3 ) )
00111     configMail->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_FROM, viewMails->columnWidth( 3 ) );
00112 
00113   if( !viewMails->isColumnHidden( 4 ) )
00114     configMail->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_TO, viewMails->columnWidth( 4 ) );
00115 
00116   if( !viewMails->isColumnHidden( 5 ) )
00117     configMail->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_SUBJECT, viewMails->columnWidth( 5 ) );
00118 
00119   if( !viewMails->isColumnHidden( 6 ) )
00120     configMail->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_DATE, viewMails->columnWidth( 6 ) );
00121 
00122   if( !viewMails->isColumnHidden( 7 ) )
00123     configMail->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_SIZE, viewMails->columnWidth( 7 ) );
00124 
00125   if( !viewMails->isColumnHidden( 8 ) )
00126     configMail->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_CONTENT, viewMails->columnWidth( 8 ) );
00127         
00128         
00129         //save models setup
00130         accountModel->saveSetup();
00131         mailModel->saveSetup();
00132         
00133         configAcc->sync();
00134         configMail->sync();
00135         
00136 }
00137 
00138 void KShowmailView::loadSetup() {
00139 
00140 //get config object for the account list
00141         KConfigGroup* configAcc = new KConfigGroup( KGlobal::config(), CONFIG_GROUP_ACCOUNT_LIST );
00142         KConfigGroup* configMail = new KConfigGroup( KGlobal::config(), CONFIG_GROUP_MESSAGE_LIST );
00143         
00144         viewAccounts->setColumnWidth( 0, configAcc->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_ACTIVE, DEFAULT_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_ACTIVE ) );
00145         viewAccounts->setColumnWidth( 1, configAcc->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_ACCOUNT, DEFAULT_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_ACCOUNT ) );
00146         viewAccounts->setColumnWidth( 2, configAcc->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_SERVER, DEFAULT_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_SERVER ) );
00147         viewAccounts->setColumnWidth( 3, configAcc->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_USER, DEFAULT_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_USER ) );
00148         viewAccounts->setColumnWidth( 4, configAcc->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_MESSAGES, DEFAULT_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_MESSAGES ) );
00149         viewAccounts->setColumnWidth( 5, configAcc->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_SIZE, DEFAULT_WIDTH_ACCOUNT_SIZE ) );
00150         
00151         viewMails->setColumnWidth( 0, configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_STATE, DEFAULT_WIDTH_MESSAGE_STATE ) );
00152         viewMails->setColumnWidth( 1, configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_NUMBER, DEFAULT_WIDTH_MESSAGE_NUMBER ) );
00153         viewMails->setColumnWidth( 2, configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_ACCOUNT, DEFAULT_WIDTH_MESSAGE_ACCOUNT ) );
00154         viewMails->setColumnWidth( 3, configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_FROM, DEFAULT_WIDTH_MESSAGE_FROM ) );
00155         viewMails->setColumnWidth( 4, configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_TO, DEFAULT_WIDTH_MESSAGE_TO ) );
00156         viewMails->setColumnWidth( 5, configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_SUBJECT, DEFAULT_WIDTH_MESSAGE_SUBJECT ) );
00157         viewMails->setColumnWidth( 6, configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_DATE, DEFAULT_WIDTH_MESSAGE_DATE ) );
00158         viewMails->setColumnWidth( 7, configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_SIZE, DEFAULT_WIDTH_MESSAGE_SIZE ) );
00159         viewMails->setColumnWidth( 8, configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_WIDTH_MESSAGE_CONTENT, DEFAULT_WIDTH_MESSAGE_CONTENT ) );
00160 
00161   viewAccounts->setColumnHidden( 0 , !configAcc->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_ACTIVE, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_ACTIVE ) );
00162   viewAccounts->setColumnHidden( 1 , !configAcc->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_ACCOUNT, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_ACCOUNT ) );
00163   viewAccounts->setColumnHidden( 2 , !configAcc->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_SERVER, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_SERVER ) );
00164   viewAccounts->setColumnHidden( 3 , !configAcc->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_USER, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_USER ) );
00165   viewAccounts->setColumnHidden( 4 , !configAcc->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_MESSAGES, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_MESSAGES ) );
00166   viewAccounts->setColumnHidden( 5 , !configAcc->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_SIZE, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_SIZE ) );
00167         
00168   viewMails->setColumnHidden( 0 , !configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_STATE, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_STATE ) );
00169   viewMails->setColumnHidden( 1 , !configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_NUMBER, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_STATE ) );
00170   viewMails->setColumnHidden( 2 , !configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_ACCOUNT, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_STATE ) );
00171   viewMails->setColumnHidden( 3 , !configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_FROM, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_STATE ) );
00172   viewMails->setColumnHidden( 4 , !configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_TO, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_STATE ) );
00173   viewMails->setColumnHidden( 5 , !configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_SUBJECT, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_STATE ) );
00174   viewMails->setColumnHidden( 6 , !configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_DATE, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_STATE ) );
00175   viewMails->setColumnHidden( 7 , !configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_SIZE, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_STATE ) );
00176   viewMails->setColumnHidden( 8 , !configMail->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_CONTENT, DEFAULT_DISPLAY_MESSAGE_STATE ) );
00177         
00178         //load sorting
00179         KConfigGroup* confSort = new KConfigGroup( KGlobal::config(), CONFIG_GROUP_VIEW );
00180         
00181         QString strSortOrderAcc = confSort->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_SORT_ORDER_ACCOUNT, DEFAULT_SORT_ORDER );
00182         int sortColumnAcc = confSort->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_SORT_COLUMN_ACCOUNT, DEFAULT_SORT_COLUMN_ACCOUNT );
00183         if( strSortOrderAcc == CONFIG_VALUE_SORT_ORDER_DESCENDING ) {
00184         
00185                 viewAccounts->sortByColumn( sortColumnAcc, Qt::DescendingOrder );
00186         
00187         } else {
00188         
00189                 viewAccounts->sortByColumn( sortColumnAcc, Qt::AscendingOrder );
00190         }
00191         
00192         QString strSortOderMail = confSort->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_SORT_ORDER_MESSAGE, DEFAULT_SORT_ORDER );
00193         int sortColumnMail = confSort->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_SORT_COLUMN_MESSAGE, DEFAULT_SORT_COLUMN_MESSAGE );
00194         if( strSortOderMail == CONFIG_VALUE_SORT_ORDER_DESCENDING ) {
00195         
00196                 viewMails->sortByColumn( sortColumnMail, Qt::DescendingOrder );
00197         
00198         } else {
00199         
00200                 viewMails->sortByColumn( sortColumnMail, Qt::AscendingOrder );
00201         }
00202         
00203         delete confSort;
00204         delete configAcc;
00205         delete configMail;
00206         
00207 }

00209 void KShowmailView::addActionToAccountList( KAction* action ) {
00210 
00211   viewAccounts->addAction( action );
00212 
00213 }
00214 
00215 void KShowmailView::addActionToMailList(KAction* action)
00216 {
00217   viewMails->addAction( action );
00218 }
